basic.description: Examination of the evolution of the traditional French-Canadian literature, especially the novel. Travaux pratiques include essays and tests. Given jointly with FREN 434/3.0.
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: La littérature canadienne-française des débuts à 1965

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites    FREN221 or (FREN212 & FREN220).
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from FREN334; FREN434 (formerly FREN402).
